featured.title: BSA Game Week — Fall 2025
featured.summary: After the huge success of our last BSA Game Week, we’re bringing the fun back—bigger, louder, and even more exciting! 😎💥 Two weekends packed with thrilling games, friendly rivalries, delicious food, and exciting prizes! 🏆🍕🎁  Game Weekends: Oct 18–19 and 25–26. Schedules of each game and details are inside each registration form.
